SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation
Annotation Type CheckContent

@Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Constraint(validatedBy=CheckContentValidator.class)
@Documented
public @interface CheckContent

Define annotation to validate content of a string, elements below are checked:

  • Character continuous repetition
  • Character list against characters whitelist
Not others check like range,max,min length,... are implemented because there others existing annotations that can do the job (see link below).

Author:
Dominique Righetto (dominique.righetto@gmail.com)
See Also:
"http://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/stable/validator/reference/en-US/html_single/#validator-customconstraints", "http://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/stable/validator/reference/en-US/html_single/#table-spec-constraints"

Optional Element Summary
 String continuousRepetitionLimitationMapJsonExpr
          Json expression to define map representing collection of characters for which the continuous repetition is limited to specified count.
 Class<?>[] groups
          Allows the specification of validation groups, to which this constraint belongs.
 String message
          Message that returns the default key for creating error messages in case the constraint is violated.
 Class<? extends javax.validation.Payload>[] payload
          Can be used by clients of the Bean Validation API to assign custom payload objects to a constraint.
 String whitelistIdentifier
          Identifier of the characters whitelist to use (identifier must be a key present into the whitelist classpath property file).
 String whitelistLocale
          Locale used to load bundle containing whitelist definition property file
 

message

public abstract String message
Message that returns the default key for creating error messages in case the constraint is violated.

Default:
"{com.github.righettod.hvsc.annotation.checkcontent}"

groups

public abstract Class<?>[] groups
Allows the specification of validation groups, to which this constraint belongs.

Default:
{}

payload

public abstract Class<? extends javax.validation.Payload>[] payload
Can be used by clients of the Bean Validation API to assign custom payload objects to a constraint. This attribute is not used by the API itself.

Default:
{}

whitelistIdentifier

public abstract String whitelistIdentifier
Identifier of the characters whitelist to use (identifier must be a key present into the whitelist classpath property file).

Default:
"default"

whitelistLocale

public abstract String whitelistLocale
Locale used to load bundle containing whitelist definition property file

Default:
""

continuousRepetitionLimitationMapJsonExpr

public abstract String continuousRepetitionLimitationMapJsonExpr
Json expression to define map representing collection of characters for which the continuous repetition is limited to specified count.
Key is the character and Value is the repetition limit count.
Ex: {"(":1,"-":1,".":3,"'":1}

Default:
""
